page.syntax: C External_Suggest(tableOrSet as c, expr as c, value as c , limit as n = 1 , moreText as c ="" , filter as c = "")
page.description: Suggest a list of possible values given a sample value (to drive auto-complete).
page.original:
Table.External_Suggest() Returns a list of suggestions from a field or expression in a table. Syntax C Suggestions = Table.External_Suggest(C tablename, C expr,C value [,N limit [, C more_text [, C filter ]]])
Similar to .Suggest(), but does not require a pointer to an open table. This method will automatically open the table in order to get the suggestions.
See <tbl>.Suggest() for an example.
